
---
title: "Enhancer promoter loops in colon tissue and colon normals"
output: html_document
abstract: "This vignette provides the code to convert the processed HiChip data into an R object"
---


```{r}
library(diffloop)

loops <- loopsMake(
    system.file("extdata/geodata", package="ColonDNATopology"),
    mergegap=0)

cc <- loops@counts
rownames(loops@colData) <- gsub(".filt.intra", "", rownames(loops@colData))
loops@colData$groups <- ifelse( grepl("N$", rownames( loops@colData )), "normal", "tumor")

save( loops, file="../data/loopsAll_hichipper2.RData" )

```
